resources.string:
Enter your first name and last initial so that you can later identify your session on iSENSE.
Press and hold the Start button, and the app will record 10 seconds of acceleration data.
After recording, you may publish your data to isense.cs.uml.edu. You are also given an option to view your data.
You may modify various settings -- explore the menus.
If setting up your own experiment: create fields named \"Time\" (time/milliseconds) and any of \"X\", \"Y\", \"Z\", and \"Accel-Magnitude\" (all Acceleration/meters per second squared).\n
Please carefully review the following agreement for this version of this app:
Upload Data or Throw It Away
